alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 02 at 9:25PM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Pike and southeastern Montgomery Counties through 1000 PM CST... At 924 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Daisy, or 9 miles east of Umpire, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenwood... Norman... Daisy... Daisy State Park... Salem in Pike County... Welsh... Lodi... Langley... Silver... Fancyhill... Hopper... Kirby... New Hope in Pike County... Caddo Gap... Bear Creek Public Use Area... Rosboro... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 300 AM CST for southwestern Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Montgomery County; Pike; Southwest Montgomery County Higher Elevations
